message: Let's split it 4:1, a fair start!
Let's start with a more balanced split, but I'll still take the majority!
Meet me in the middle, Bob!
You're getting desperate, Alice, so I'll take the lion's share!
You're getting greedy, Bob! Meet me at 60/40!
Alright, alright, let's make it fair and even this time!
You can do better than that, Bob! Meet me at 55/45!
You're not getting any closer, Alice! I'm not budging!
You're running out of time, Bob! Meet me at 65/35!
Last chance, Alice. This is my final offer. Take it or leave it!
This is my last chance, Bob. Take it or leave it!
No deal, Alice. I'll take what I can get, and it's not from you!
